entries.text:
"Will you raise taxes?"

EVERYBODY DRINK

This question gets asked EVERY time.

CNN trying to get that sound bite so desperately. Very sad.
Bernie is looking *much* better tonight.
Just say no Liz
Same goddamn questions.
Sanders is really about-about it
Why ask the same gotcha question as the last debate?

Ok so did CNN take all their questions from Republican think-tanks or what?

Straight up Republican talking points
Ugh here we go with the taxes and healthcare questions again. Same thing in every debate.
Oh come on CNN, fuck you with that question
Still with the taxes question.  How have they not understood this yet???
Answer the fucking question.
How many debates do we have to ask this exact same fucking question?
Mayor Pete
She definitely looks different. Maybe in the fall she’s just not as tan, maybe she just caked on makeup
Warren is so corny and cringe. Bernie sounding strong today
Yeah sure thing CNN put it in the most unflattering way possible and demand a yes or no answer, gtfo.
Oh boy Elizabeth Warren doing the “I talked with” trick.

He’s toast in Texas 

He became a single issue candidate - and that issue doesn’t fly in Texas very well
they always frame that medicare for all question so poorly it pissed me off everytime
Here comes the same 45 minutes we've had on Healthcare in every debate. (Not saying it's not important, just wish they took a new approach to it)
How so
I like Bernie more but Warren definitely has the best energy on stage
Can we stop with this right wing bait question?
CNN keeps pushing the Medicare for All republican talking point
Oh so they're not asking anything new? What a mess.

Moderator: Will your healthcare plan raise taxes?

*Warren proceeds to talk about selfies and cancer*
He's got a fresh new heart. He's ready to go!
And now for the traditional attempt to get Warren and Sanders to say taxes will go up, and not provide any context....
20 minutes in and I'm already tired of CNN's shit.
Average Americans are NOT logical. George Carlin said it best. "Think of the average stupid person. 50% are stupider than that."
Damn, that’s a tough one then
Lmao. I get that reference and you have my upvote.
Warren, Sanders, Booker, Klobuchar, and Harris are Senators. Gabbard is in the House. I’d say it’s very pertinent.
How fucking hard is it to grasp that Medicare for all will mean higher taxes but you will still pay less than you're paying for premiums today.
Weird how the question never comes up with the repubs on how to pay for all of the never ending wars they start.

I am so sick of this fucking question 

Yes taxes will go up, but you won’t pay for private insurance anymore. Your costs go down.

Stop asking this stupid question.
Killer answer from Warren. Fuck insurance companies.
Warren trying to come across as the least old old person on stage.
They want her to say "your taxes will go up" ... that way they can play that on an Ad over and over and over. The soundbite is all theyre after.
the way i see it
... lol
“They wished me luck and sent me on my way.”
Tulsi Gabbard looks like she sniffs a hot dog before she bites it.
That slight look from Warren really shows how she might destroy him like Delaney.
I wish she would just say yes so we can move the fuck on from this. I'm tired of this fucking question.
Except when she speaks

Just say overall costs will go down.

Private insurance is a tax-like system. With that gone, costs will go down.
Shut the fuck up Pete
Oh god now I'm agreeing with Mayor Pete this is a disaster Liz
love watching these
actually biden, bernie & warren will all beat him
These fucking CNN questions baiting one-liner conflicts instead of encouraging meaningful discussion.
If they can't rebut them here then they can't rebut them in the general
Your talking to people who dont understand marginal tax rates. :-/
Bernie wrote the bill, not Warren
Dick
Bernar D. Sanders, please demolish these establishment politicians.
Pete Buttigieg looks like Celtics coach Brad Stevens

That "yes or no question" was intentionally misleading, a trap.

Buttegieg is polling at ~5% but gets tons of big-money donations...there's a reason for that.
Oh damn are we going to see fireworks?

The moderator takes a shot at Bernie, Pete please respond

Slight typo: changed second a to at
So who still likes Pete unironically

"Let's be clear"  
Drink!
Without realizing they'd pay less due to health care lol
Pete's whole framing is sleezy
No one else is.
holy shit this debate is a lot more aggressive than the ones before
Pete you can just call it public option instead of giving it your dumb fucking nickname
Pete is in your face!
Pete looks heartbroken
Pete, she said "no" twice.
Medicare for all who want it: all of the liabilities to the insurance companies are pushed into the public option, soaring the price and sabotaging the system.
Damn. I used to respect Pete.
And Warren is already starting out with a strong fight. This is going to be fun.
Why am I watching these debates again? My mind is unlikely going to be changed and 12 people is chaotic

It's a bad-faith question meant to harm campaigns. Yes, middle class taxes may go up, they would go far higher for the rich and corporations, causing costs to go down. 

Buttigieg just became a talking head to me for jumping on Warren after being asked that question and then offering a milquetoast alternative that in reality is more of the status-quo.
Pete with the subtle head shake.
It is, but you should be able to explain it on TV and not feed the narrative you can't answer yes or no.  She's been asked three times now, she should be ready for it.
Why do we want to waste debate time with gotcha questions like that though?  Taxes go up, costs go down, more money in your pocket.  The only reason to focus only on part one is deception.

That’s not what Medicare for all who want it means. Medicare for all who want it gets rid of the issues of Obamacare forcing people to pay for insurance that they can’t afford. Medicare for all who want it means a combination of private and public where people can get a basic public package or more expensive, better private packages.
If you care about this issue Pete disqualified himself with that answer.
What about people who have insurance through their employer? (As of 2017 58.4% of non elderly population). They will be paying a lot more.
Haha, nice try. That dog don’t hunt
That's a big no from me Pete
The small town gay mayor running for president is a standard politician? Gtfoh
People don’t seem to understand basic arithmetic.  Net cost seems to be lost on people when the word “tax” is said.  You included?
Pete is beating Warren in this debate, and it's Warren's fault. She needs to lean on facts, not soundbites.
I don't get a fucking choice on my healthcare as is! My damn job does that, and can take it from me at any moment.

Fool me once shame on me, fool me twice shame on you.

The media has to continue to do some earnest reflection, particularly when it comes to the coverage of this race in the context of a Trump presidency, if the want to live up to fulfill their role as the Fourth Estate.
Thank you for clarifying petes framing on this one
Comments like this have finally reached hilarity to me at this point in America’s trajectory. Illegal impeachment? Lmao
The teacher and the student going face to face, jeez.
Medicare For All polls over 70% among Democrats and over 50% among all Americans Pete. Don't you have some billionaires to meet with?
I watch US politics largely for entertainment. People like the underdog.
Omg! An actual dabate between Mayor Pete and Warren!
The current subsidies for Obamacare aren't affordable for a lot of people, Mayor Pete
That choice can increase prices because US companies claim RnD costs, etc.
Mayor Bootyjudge taking a brave stance defending the for-profit health insurance industry.
Talk about prescription drugs. That's the real cost problem. Not insurance or co-pays. It's the drugs you can't afford that's killing people
Lol, Bernie just had to say it
The American people **are** wrong when they say they want a choice - the choice between plans isn't a real choice, it's a false choice.
Mayor Pete defending private insurance. Get the fuck out of here with that shit.
Warren knows and has repeatedly said as much
Oof, “I don’t think the American people are wrong”. I thought Warren had him cornered with “Medicare for all who can afford it”
No offense  taken. Just give us what's best for us... Bernie's M4A plan
Damn Warren is getting styled on
Pete is fucking kicking Warren and Bernie's ass over MFA.
People like it. It’s easy to understand
Amy Klobuchar
Sanders has been clear on this long before Liz.
Love u bernie but stop saying "as somebody who wrote the damn bill"
His support is almost solely young men, and young people vote at the lowest rate among any group. And that goes double for primaries.
Can we please get Sanders sing along lyrics CNN??

Yet which is why Buttigieg corporate backers want a fundamentally flawed plan like the public option.  Keep the pool restricted to only those who cost the most to provide for and you make sure the pool goes bankrupt.
Pete talks about bridging divides in the middle of a sideline attack
I mean.. well... maybe Booty's got a point about that whole "why polarize further immediately" thing? I guess it's pragmatic.

"Taxes may go up, but premiums and co-pays and deductibles will go away."

Why not just say that?
Alright Pete...you're losing me here.

Pete Buttigieg is a corporate stooge and absolutely fucking stupid. Stop letting that dumb, neoliberal shitburger answer questions anymore. Fuck him. 

And if you believe his claptrap you are actually a republican and have no real politics.
“...Wrote the damn bill”! *Takes a shot*
Pete:  the reason why you can't allow choice is because private insurers will kick sick people off their rolls and dump them on the public option.
Okay Bernie, the "wrote the damn bill" was cute the first time you repeated it, let it rest now.
I may disagree with Sanders but I respect that he is upfront about the tax increase. It feels refreshing.
Shame on you, Pete. This is a life and death issue for people. This is no laughing matter. Stop trying to stab us in the back with lies. Unforgivable.
We may do better than the Canadians but they do what they do right now with lower tax rates than us. Will the rates go up to Netherlands levels of 60-70%?

The problem is that if you say "Yes, taxes will go up, but you won't have to pay a health care premium anymore and in the end you'll save money overall" gets edited to "Yes, taxes will go up" and your opponents just yell that part all day, every day and that's all that the people that aren't paying attention will hear.

Literally, I feel like he is fear-mongering a bit, too. He knows she's the big one to take.down, though. It helps him more than it would help her to take the bait. Making me really disrespect CNN how they're handling the questions.
THANK YOU BERNIE. Just be straightforward.
Sanders with the straight answer. Gotta love him. I don't know why Warren has such a problem saying this.
Warren is driving me crazy dodging this tax question just say yes holy shit
Why would Texas want Harris?
There, Bernie says it straight. Taxes go up but you still save money because all other costs go down.
Stop supporting cable "news".
Yo I think I become more confused about understanding healthcare after these debates
Love warren but she is not answering the tax increase part
Your don't think that "Medicare for all who want it" won't piss off Republicans? Did you forget about the ACA?

It takes a billionaire to stand up to a billionaire(allegedly)

Just kidding tho, fuck we live in an oligarchy

It doesn’t help that CNN frames the question to get an answer that they want. They know the majority of Americans will only hear higher taxes and turn off their ears. CNN is pretty against having a comprehensive healthcare plan since that means less money that floats to them from their investors.
Amy Klobuchar ate salad with a comb
Bernie! Calm down! Your heart!
Inb4 CNN creates a sound bite of Warren saying the words "taxes", "will", "go", and "up" out of context and put them together.
Bernie could use this as an attack on Warren how she doesn't want to give the soundbite, while still agreeing with her. Bernie if you're hiring
Thank you Bernie, for finally framing it clearly.
she's trying to use Bernie as a proxy IMO, letting him take the heat while endorsing it. She's getting caught here though.
Pete is such a corporate Republican.
What choice are people even talking about when it comes to health care? Literally, the only "choice" insurance offers is a tailored "we won't cover that" plan.

Why is Warren being portrayed as the big M4A candidate? It's Bernie who moved the overton window to the left. It's because of him that we're even having this discussion. She hasn't even put out a PLAN for it.
We know who is buying pete.
Average donation is $32
No she refuses to say taxes increase
I am all for trashing Obamacare for something better
Warren is making a massive mistake by not just admitting the increase in taxes like Bernie.
Guts maybe.
Same with warren saying “I will not endorse a plan...”
"I'm soorry"
I just wanna know who's breathing into the microphone.
It’s almost like he wrote the damn bill.
They are all ganging up on Warren. This is not good.

Will you raise taxes on the middle class?
The answer is yes she will but she keeps dodging it. This question has come up every couple days for the last 2 months and she just avoids it every time.
Yes, but Warren hasn’t.
Goddamn Klobuchar just obliterated Warren
Remember you pay close to the same amount of Income taxes compared to a Scandinavian country, yet America gets nothing in return...
Yea it's 100% a soundbite trap.
She's trying to avoid the inevitable attack ads that will only show that part of her statement and leave out the context that overall costs will go down.
Klobuchar can piss off, too.
Imagine running for president vowing not to give people healthcare
Amy we say it's Republican talking points because they are!

He's defending people's right to choose. We don't have to outlaw UPS and FedEX for USPS, we don't have to outlaw Private School for Public Schools, we can have both and let people choose what they want. 

When people see how much better Medicare is the health insurance companies will have to evolve and become worth the money, like they are in the UK and other countries with universal healthcare, or they'll go extinct and we'll have everyone on medicare by choice, not force.
President Bernie will make it happen with his grassroot support
How aboot that, eh?

This discussion about health care is actually really good but like always y’all are focused on tearing your least favorite candidates down instead of focusing on the substance and merit of their arguments. Everyone here would be better than Trump. It would be wise to realize that
As important as healthcare is... My God I could just rewatch clips from all the past debates and it's all the same. Kind of wish they avoided this topic.
he wouldn't have gotten anything done
Obamacare wanted a single payer system originally and he still supports a single payer system as he said before
M4AWWI it is progressive. Your purity test is a false premise.

Ok, Warren's unwilling to acknowledge that by "costs will go down" she means "taxes will go up, but total costs will go down". It's hurting her. I understand the fear that it will be used as a soundbyte, but at this point her evasiveness is a much more damning soundbyte.
Amy's ideas are even worse than Pete's
Not sure why Warren won't just say taxes will go up.  Honestly I don't think it is even that controversial.  Just show how it isn't actually more expensive than what people are paying for insurance.
Well, I guess we're seeing the capitalist machine freaking out about Warren's popularity.
Insurance IS a death panel.

Public Option vs. Medicare for All SHOULD be the debate between the left and right in this country. It's a shame that the Right has gone all in on private insurance and the Left of Center party is having this discussion.
Bernie is so fucking sexy rn
Obamacare was **always** a shitty compromise.
not a great look for Warren by not answering the question.
Thats the point, unfortunately.

I'm late. Where do I stream this?

edit: thanks guys!

LOL insurance companies have had 30 years to get their shit together and quit being predatory. 
Why are Klobuchar and Pete defending them?

CNN: Bernie, will taxes go up?

Bernie: Yes, primarily for the wealthy. But overall costs will go down for the vast majority of people.

CNN: There you have it. Bernie wants to raise taxes!
Amy Klobuchar is useless. Who wants to vote for a Republican-Democrat? No one.
